SELECT bard_id, bard_type, user_id, bard_tit, bard_cn, bard_rdate, bard_cnt, bard_like_cnt, bard_stts FROM bard_tb WHERE bard_stts = 1
AND (bard_type = #{bardType} OR (#{bardType} = 0 AND bard_type IN (1, 2, 3)))
AND bard_tit LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND bard_cn LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY bard_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bard_tb WHERE bard_stts = 1
AND (bard_type = #{bardType} OR (#{bardType} = 0 AND bard_type IN (1, 2, 3)))
AND bard_tit LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND bard_cn LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bard_tb ( bard_id, bard_type, user_id, bard_tit, bard_cn, bard_stts ) VALUES ( #{bardId}, #{bardType}, 1, #{bardTit}, #{bardCn}, 1 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE bard_type = VALUES(bard_type), bard_tit = VALUES(bard_tit), bard_cn = VALUES(bard_cn)
mapper.update: UPDATE bard_tb SET bard_stts = 0 WHERE bard_id = #{bardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_tb ( reply_id, bard_id, reply_user_id, reply_cn, reply_stts, reply_gp, reply_gp_seq, reply_depth ) VALUES ( #{replyId}, #{bardId}, #{replyUserId}, #{replyCn}, 1, #{replyGp}, #{replyGpSeq}, #{replyDepth} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE reply_cn = VALUES(reply_cn)
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, reply_user_id, reply_cn, reply_rdate, reply_gp, reply_gp_seq, reply_depth FROM reply_tb WHERE bard_id = #{bardId} and reply_stts = 1 ORDER BY reply_rdate DESC, reply_gp, reply_depth, reply_gp_seq DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply_tb WHERE reply_stts = 1 AND bard_id = #{bardId}
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(reply_gp), 0) AS reply_gp_max, COALESCE(MAX(reply_id), 0) AS reply_id_max FROM reply_tb WHERE bard_id = #{bardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply_tb SET reply_stts = 0 WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(reply_gp_seq), 0) AS reply_gp_seq_max FROM reply_tb WHERE bard_id = #{bardId} and reply_gp = 1
